name: Tei-guidelines
tagline: Hugh's copy of the TEI Guidelines
body:
### TEI Pointers Revision

[This copy](Guidelines-web/en/html/index.html) of the [TEI Guidelines](http://www.tei-c.org/release/doc/tei-p5-doc/en/html/index.html) shows the latest version of the [TEI Pointers](https://github.com/hcayless/TEI_Pointers_Draft) revisions. See especially the [TEI Pointers Introduction](Guidelines-web/en/html/SA.html#SATS) for changes to the [original document](http://www.tei-c.org/release/doc/tei-p5-doc/en/html/SA.html#SATS).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
